description: The Dentist hosts a superb dentist in the Lake OH. Our friendly dentists offer general, family & cosmetic dentistry. We accept Illinois All Kids & most insurance plans. We also offer discounts for patients without insurance. Call us today at (224) 555-5555 to schedule an appointment.
